title: An Act relative to mandated use of paid time off for quarantine purposes

abstracts.abstract: By Mr. Tarr, a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1374) of Bruce E. Tarr for legislation relative to mandated use of paid time off for quarantine purposes.  Labor and Workforce Development.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Labor and Workforce Development

related_entities.name: committee on Labor and Workforce Development

actions.description: Hearing scheduled for 11/20/2025 from 10:00 AM-01:00 PM in B-1
Hearing rescheduled to 11/20/2025 from 10:00 AM-12:00 PM in B-1                                              and Virtual Hearing updated to New End Time
Bill reported favorably by committee and referred to the committee on Senate Ways and Means

related_entities.name: the committee on Senate Ways and Means
committee on Senate Ways and Means
